name: Mack Anthem
detail: Developed in partnership with Mack® Trucks Inc., this authentic replica model comes with an array of realistic technical details and functions, including front-axle steering, rear wheel drive and a 6 cylinder straight engine with working pistons and spinning radiator fan.

name: 4x4 Mercedes-Benz Zetros Trial Truck
detail: This LEGO® Technic™ 4x4 Mercedes-Benz Zetros Trial Truck (42129) model is packed with authentic details like working suspension on all 4 wheels, a detailed gearbox and differential locking.

name: PEUGEOT 9X8 24H Le Mans Hybrid Hypercar
detail: A celebration for race car fans Pay tribute to 100 years of racing at Le Mans in 2023 with this authentic LEGO® Technic™ PEUGEOT 9X8 24H Le Mans Hybrid Hypercar (42156) model building kit for adults

name: London Bus
detail: London Bus features authentic details, turning wheels, transparent window and light elements and stickers for the number plate, route number, destination name and advertising banners inspired by LEGO Creator models 21013 Big Ben and 10232 Palace Cinema (not included).

name: The Knight Bus
detail: Give your young witch or wizard the ride of their life aboard the LEGO® Harry Potter™ 75957 Knight Bus™! When kids catch the purple triple-decker bus, they know they're in for a wild ride.

name: Heavy-duty Tow Truck
detail: Just like a real heavy-duty tow truck, this model features pneumatic pump functions including an extending lifting boom, a lifting crane boom and an extending crane boom.
